title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 274: Featuring Patrick Marleau
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys thank the listeners with a surprise episode featuring Patrick Marleau and their first AMA. Pat joins (1:14:44) to talk about his long career, Jumbo Joe, playing in Toronto and a bunch more. The guys also play the audio of their first AMA ever, done live on Twitch last week (17:59).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
